description: To learn more about the Shipping Rates SPI and how to use it, click [here](https://support.wix.com/en/article/velo-shipping-rates-spi).

params.name: options
params.doc: Shipping origin, shipping destination, and general configurations.

docs.summary: Retrieves relevant shipping rates provided by integrated shipping providers.
description: This endpoint is called by Wix Stores to the relevant registered shipping providers, based on the requested destination of the items being sent.

> **Note:** The `items` and `options` params are provided by the cart. However, you may add to them if, for example, you want to integrate with a shipping provider that requires information not already provided.

examples.title: Returning shipping rates based on quantity of items in cart.
body: // Currency value is taken from provided options object
// If cartQuantity is less than 3, the following shipping rate is returned
// Currency value is taken from provided options object

members.name: type
members.doc:
Additional charge type.
Supported value/s:
 - `"HANDLING_FEE"`

members.name: details
members.doc: Details of the additional charge. For example, `"Handling fee of $5 applied for gift wrapping."`

members.name: price
members.doc: Cost of additional charge.

members.name: addressLine
members.doc: Main address line, usually street and number, as free text.

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: Street address object, with number and name in separate fields.

members.name: addressLine2
members.doc: Free text providing more detailed address information, such as apartment, suite, or floor.

members.name: city
members.doc: City name.

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: Code for a subdivision (such as state, prefecture, or province) in an [ISO 3166-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2) format.

members.name: country
members.doc: 2-letter country code in an [ISO-3166 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: Postal or zip code.

members.name: firstName
members.doc: Buyer's first name.

members.name: lastName
members.doc: Buyer's last name.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Buyer's phone number.

members.name: company
members.doc: Company name (when relevant).

members.name: vatId
members.doc: Tax information (for Brazil only). If `vatId.id` is provided, `vatId.type` must also be set.

members.name: catalogItemId
members.doc: ID of the item within its Wix or 3rd-party catalog. For example, `productId` for Wix Stores or `eventId` for Wix Events.

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the catalog app. For example, the Wix Stores `appId`, or the 3rd-party `appId`.

members.name: options
members.doc: Additional info in key:value form. For example, `{"options":{"Size": "M", "Color": "Red"}}` or `{"variantId": "<VARIANT_ID>"}`.

members.name: price
members.doc: Amount charged for this shipping rate.

members.name: currency
members.doc:
Currency code of the shipping rate price. This can differ between carriers. For example, `"USD"` or `"EUR"`.
This must match the value of the `currency` property received in the `options` object. Shipping rates with other currencies are not displayed on the site.
For example, a U.S. carrier might provide prices in USD, but a U.K. based carrier would use GBP.

members.name: additionalCharges
members.doc: Additional costs such as handling fee for packaging of fragile items.

members.name: name
members.doc: Item name.

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Item quantity.

members.name: catalogReference
members.doc: References to the item's origin catalog.

members.name: physicalProperties
members.doc: Physical properties of the item. When relevant, contains information such as SKU, item weight and shippability.

members.name: price
members.doc: Price of a single item.

members.name: deliveryTime
members.doc: Expected delivery time in free text. For example, `"3-5 business days"`.

members.name: shippingDestination
members.doc: Address the items are shipped to.

members.name: shippingOrigin
members.doc: Address the items are sent from.

members.name: buyerDetails
members.doc: Buyer's contact details.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight measurement unit. Supported values: `"KG"` (kilograms) or `"LB"` (pounds).

members.name: taxIncludedInPrices
members.doc: Whether tax in included in the items' prices.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency code the shipping rates will be presented in. For example, `"USD"` or `"EUR"`.

members.name: instanceId
members.doc: Instance ID of the app that is providing the shipping rates.

members.name: shippingRateDecimalPlaces
members.doc:
Expected decimal places for the shipping rate.
For example, if this field is `2`, the shipping rate could be: 10$, 10.1$, 10.12$ (up to 2 decimal places).
However it **cannot** be: 10.123$ (or further).
If the requested number of decimal places is less than the shipping option's actual rate, that shipping option will be ignored and not provided to the user.

members.name: shippingDestination
members.doc: Address the items are shipped to.

members.name: shippingOrigin
members.doc: Address the items are sent from.

members.name: buyerDetails
members.doc: Buyer's contact details.

members.name: weightUnit
members.doc: Weight measurement unit. Supported values: `"KG"` (kilograms) or `"LB"` (pounds).

members.name: taxIncludedInPrices
members.doc: Whether tax in included in the items' prices.

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency code the shipping rates will be presented in. For example, `"USD"` or `"EUR"`.

members.name: instanceId
members.doc: Instance ID of the app that is providing the shipping rates.

members.name: shippingRateDecimalPlaces
members.doc:
Expected decimal places for the shipping rate.
For example, if this field is `2`, the shipping rate could be: $10, $10.1, $10.12 (up to 2 decimal places).

However it **cannot** be: $10.123 (or further).

If the requested number of decimal places is less than the shipping option's actual rate, that shipping option will be ignored and not provided to the user.

members.name: weight
members.doc: Item weight. Measurement unit (KG or LB) is taken from `weightUnit` field.

members.name: sku
members.doc: Stock keeping unit. Learn more about [SKUs](https://www.wix.com/encyclopedia/definition/stock-keeping-unit-sku).

members.name: shippable
members.doc: Whether this item is shippable.

members.name: address
members.doc: Pickup address.

members.name: pickupMethod
members.doc:
Pickup method.
Supported values:
 - `"STORE_PICKUP"`
 - `"PICKUP_POINT"`

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique code (or ID) of selected shipping option. For example, `"usps_std_overnight"`.

members.name: title
members.doc: Shipping option title. For example, `"USPS Standard Overnight Delivery"`, `"Standard"` or `"First-Class Package International"`.

members.name: logistics
members.doc: Shipping logistics.

members.name: cost
members.doc: Shipping cost.

members.name: shippingRates
members.doc: Available shipping rates. These define the shipping rate options that are displayed to site visitors on the Cart and Checkout pages.

members.name: name
members.doc: Short name.

members.name: description
members.doc: Description.

members.name: number
members.doc: Street number.

members.name: name
members.doc: Street name.

members.name: id
members.doc: Buyer's tax ID.

members.name: type
members.doc:
VAT type.
Supported values:
 - `"CPF"`
 - `"CNPJ"`
